transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan, ek second na main ye phone laga raha hu.
Executive: Haan sir main abhi thodi der mein call back kar raha hu main abhi thoda busy hu abhi.
Customer: Ek second ruko toh bhai.
Executive: Haan bolo.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello, haan bolo.
Customer: Haan main ye keh raha hu ki main tumhare jo company mere India Mart ke wo back end se log kar raha hu, theek hai? Aur main tumhara jo jo concern hai wo Google pe maine concern raise kar diya hai. Chaaro paancho photo pe report maar diye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai? Feedback bhi de diya. Mere end pe jitna ho sakta tha maine utna kar diya hai. Ab inka dekho ki kab tak lagaya jata hai kab tak ye remove karte hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ek baar main tumhare paas abhi ek feedback form aayega mera. Toh us pe satisfied kar dena.
Executive: Theek hai. Mere paas aayega?
Customer: Haan mere paas mil jayega.
Executive: Theek hai tab main kar dunga.
Customer: Haan aur idhar se maine jo report karni thi maine report kar di hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur ek second na.
Customer: Tumne ye ek second uske liye ek cheez hai na tumhare peechhe cheez hai ye.
Customer: Hmm?
Customer: Tumne teen baar ye chaar baar.
Customer: Kya chaar baar?
Customer: Jo concern raise kiya hai photo wala. Ek baar pakki hoti hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan. Pakki ke sur ke 70 70 ek number teen number ab agar tumko koi wo ticket mat raise karna koi concern raise mat karna agar koi problem aaye toh mujhe direct connect karna sir. Theek hai? Aaj mere number pe.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Mere end pe jitna hona tha maine kar diya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Dekho tumhare paas mail aayi hai.

Customer: Kab tak ho jayega sir ye waise?
Customer: Ye maine toh abhi daal diya hai ab dekho tumhare paas mail aata hai kya aata hai mail aane ka.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye maine maine maine saari photo pe report maar di hai. Kitna lagwa dena likh dena. Hmm? Saari photo pe pehle saari photo pe maine report maar di hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Saari photo pe maine feedback bhi diya. Haan. Uske baad uske baad maine ek concern raise bhi kar diya yahi hatane ka.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ek baar ek baar apni mail pe tumhari mail laga dena wo mail aati hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Apni mail uske andar report marna photo pe. Ek baar uske andar feedback bhi le lena.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Personal mail pe main personal mail pe apni mail pe dalunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm. Aur report laga dena photo pe.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Abhi baat laga ke photo pe waari teen chaar apni teen concern dal do.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm. Aur aur jitne jitne jaise chaar paanch mail hai na tumhare paas sabse mail laga do unhi photo pe jaake. Saari mail un photo pe. Aisa hoga na jaise chaar paanch chhe mail se paanch mail jo hai seedhe jaldhi aa jayega toh seedhe remove kar denge.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Haan update hone mein shayad update hone mein shayad Google ko kitna time lagta hai? Lekin main tumko bataunga kitna time lagta hai.
Executive: Hmm. Bas bas ab toh ho jayega. Ho jayega abhi maine bhi maan liya agar alag alag email pe karenge.
Customer: Bas ek minute.
Customer: Alag alag email pe karenge. Aise rahega. Toh jab isse jyada jaldi ho jayega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan. Baaki sir aur koi bhai wagera.
Customer: Kyu bhai?
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Baaki aur main thodi der mein main call back kar raha hu tumko abhi main jara busy hu.
Customer: Are toh ek minute ruko main apna feedback form bhejta hu ek baar ki tumhare paas aaya ki nahi aaya tum check kar lena.
Executive: Haan bhej dena main check kar lunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove photos from IndiaMART.

- Wants to know how long removal process takes.



Resolution:

- Executive informed the customer about process.

- Asked to fill the feedback form.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check after customer sends feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- photos, removal, feedback, concern
